DOC.brief_summary: This first-year part two-phase prospective study . The aim study investigate prevalence rate eat disorder Taiwan , 's correlate psychosocial risk factor establish validity index BITE . The study subject consist Taiwanese gift dance high school student age , sex , school-matched ordinary class student . All student complete questionnaire ( Eating Altitude Test ( EAT-26 ) , Bulimic Investigatory Test , Ediburgh ( BITE ) , Body Shape Questionnaire ( BSQ ) , Physical Appearance Related Teasing Scale , Pubertal Develoment Scale , Brief Symptom Rating Scale ( BSRS ) first phase . All subject threshold ( EAT-26 score≧20 BMI≦17.5m2 ; symptom scale score BITE≧15 and/or severity scale≧5 ) , 10 % sub-threshold case need receive second-phase interview two senior psychiatrist . The content interview include SCID-IP , risk factor assessment eat disorder . The known risk factor include personal factor ( history obesity , psychiatric , menstruation , tease , sexual physical abuse , etc . ) well family factor ( parental problem , history obesity , diet , psychiatric illness etc. ) . Statistical analysis conduct use SPSS 10.0 Windows/PC . Categorical data analyze nonparametric test ( Chi-square test ) . ANOVA Student ’ t-test use continuous data analysis . Reliability assess internal consistency test-retest reliability . Inter-rater reliability assess Kappa statistic . The sensitivity specificity eat disorder calculate individual screening instrument.ROC analyse undertaken evaluate overall performance BITE +/- EAT detect eat disorder case . Regression analysis apply determine predictor disorder eat eat disorder status . A value P < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Studies Eating Disorders Gifted Dance Students ( 1st Year )
DOC.detailed_description: This first-year part two-phase prospective study . The aim study investigate prevalence rate eat disorder Taiwan , 's correlate psychosocial risk factor establish validity index BITE . The study subject consist Taiwanese gift dance high school student comparable ordinary class student . Parental inform consent nonpartipation deliver 3 day study started.All student complete questionnaire ( Eating Altitude Test ( EAT-26 ) , Bulimic Investigatory Test , Ediburgh ( BITE ) , Body Shape Questionnaire ( BSQ ) , Physical Appearance Related Teasing Scale , Pubertal Develoment Scale , Brief Symptom Rating Scale ( BSRS ) first phase . All subject threshold ( EAT-26 score≧20 BMI≦17.5Kg/m2 ; symptom scale score BITE≧15 and/or severity scale≧5 ) , 10 % sub-threshold case need receive second-phase interview two senior psychiatrist . The content interview include SCID-IP , risk factor assessment eat disorder . The known risk factor include personal factor ( history obesity , psychiatric , menstruation , tease , sexual physical abuse , etc . ) well family factor ( parental problem , history obesity , diet , psychiatric illness etc. ) . Statistical analysis conduct use SPSS 10.0 Windows/PC . Categorical data analyze nonparametric test ( Chi-square test ) . ANOVA Student ’ t-test use continuous data analysis . Reliability assess internal consistency test-retest reliability . Inter-rater reliability assess Kappa statistic . The sensitivity specificity eat disorder calculate individual screening instrument.ROC analyse undertaken evaluate overall performance BITE +/- EAT detect eat disorder case . Regression analysis apply determine predictor disorder eat eat disorder status . A value P < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: gift dance student ordinary high school student .
